title: Bowl Might Not Have Been Super for Stocks
sub_head: Orange is the new black when it comes to Super Bowl indicators
body:
Superstitious investors can breathe a sigh of relief following Sunday’s Super Bowl—or can they?
The Super Bowl Indicator bodes well for U.S. stocks for the remainder of the year when a team from the original National Football League, what is now the National Football Conference, such as the Los Angeles Rams wins as opposed to an American Football Conference squad like Sunday’s loser, the Cincinnati Bengals.
